mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from t_role r left join t_user_role ur on (r.id = ur.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.id = ur.user_id) left join t_menu_role mr on (mr.role_id = r.id) left join t_menu m on (m.id = mr.menu_id) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''
